 def markHistory(document, comment):
 portal_workflow = document.portal_workflow
 last_workflow_item = portal_workflow.getInfoFor(ob=document, 
 name='history', wf_id='edit_workflow')[-1]
 if last_workflow_item['comment'] != comment:
 portal_workflow.doActionFor(document, action='edit_action', comment=comment)
 
 state = context.getSimulationState()
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 order = context.getParentValue()
 if state in ['planned', 'ordered']:
 instance = context.getAggregateValue(portal_type=['Software Instance', 'Slave Instance'])
 instance_software_release_url = instance.getUrlString()
 line_software_release_document = context.getAggregateValue(portal_type='Software Release')
 line_software_release_url = ''
 if line_software_release_document is not None:
 line_software_release_url = line_software_release_document.getUrlString()
 
 software_release_document = context.Base_getSoftwareReleaseDocument(instance_software_release_url)
 
 if line_software_release_url == '' or \
 line_software_release_url != instance_software_release_url:
 if software_release_document is not None:
 # update
 aggregate_value_list = [q for q in context.getAggregateValueList() if q.getPortalType() != 'Software Release']
 aggregate_value_list.append(software_release_document)
 context.setAggregateValueList(aggregate_value_list)
 if context.getSimulationState() == 'planned':
 context.getParentValue().order(comment='Associated Software Release with %r' % software_release_document.getUrlString())
 else:
 markHistory(context.getParentValue(), comment='Updated Software Release with %r' % software_release_document.getUrlString())
 return True
 else:
